title: Clock Face Twelve-Thirty

nouns: A clock is an instrument to indicate, keep, and co-ordinate time.
A timepiece that shows the time of day
An instrument used to measure or keep track of time.
Instrument to measure or keep track of time.
An instrument used to measure or keep track of time; a non-portable timepiece.

description: The face of an analog clock displaying the time as twelve-thirty.
apple_vendor_description: The 12:30 emoji on Apple devices displays a crisp, white clock face with elegant, dark numerals and hands, rendered with Appleâ€™s signature soft rounded edges and subtle 3D shading. Realistic lighting accentuates the polished surface, conveying a precise moment in time with clarity and a touch of sophisticated simplicity. This emoji is perfect for indicating a specific appointment, a scheduled event, or a deadline on Apple devices.
